title: Records Practice
description: Create a function that returns a person's full details as a named record and destructure it.
instructions:
1. Create a function `getPersonDetails()` that returns a named record with name, age, and email fields
2. Call the function and destructure the result
3. Print each field on a separate line

testCases.description: Function returns a named record with correct fields

hints.text: Use ({Type field1, Type field2}) syntax for named record types.
Destructure named records with var (:field1, :field2) = record;
Return the record as (field1: value1, field2: value2)

commonMistakes.consequence: Compilation error - named fields use their names
commonMistakes.correction: Access named fields by name: record.name, not record.$1

commonMistakes.consequence: Creates new variables instead of matching fields
commonMistakes.correction: Use (:name, :age) not (name, age) for named records
